StarFlier::

She looked at Sonic Storm and then to Perceptor. "Uh, add something 
to my form? I can train. Training programs are nothing new. Well, 
they are in a way. But it's ok to introduce a training program. It's 
the adding things to me that I am not sre of. Could you explain that 
a little more?"  She took her glass of energon and drank form it. Her 
optics flashed brightly as the energy filled her power cells. "Hmm, 
tastey."  Her green scales shimmered for a moment, as they infused 
the energy into them. Her wings shined and shimmered. She flexed them 
and then refolded them behind her back. "Oh, that is good stuff."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> "I love that you think in that way my dear"said Perceptor while he 
> looked to StarFlier"But we must wait... by now... after we efeat 
> Unicron and they could hurt you my dear... Perhaps if youlet do a 
> little modifications in your body and with a little training you 
> will be able fight against MAximals... What do you said?" and 
> looking to the other male he said "Let me serve you energon and now 
> we can discuss..."Perceptor pressed a button and three glases of 
> fresh energin (Energon liquid)appeared.
